highlights: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in withdraw() function

security_issues.title: Reentrancy in withdraw()
security_issues.description: The withdraw() function makes an external call before updating state variables.
security_issues.recommendation: Follow the checks-effects-interactions pattern and update state variables before making external calls.

security_issues.title: Missing zero-address validation
security_issues.description: The constructor does not validate that the owner address is not the zero address.
security_issues.recommendation: Add a require statement to validate that the owner address is not the zero address.
